title: What encoding is this?
content: This is a picture of the encoded code. I'm just wondering what is the encoding that it is using.

comments.text: you are probably opening a binary file in a text viewer

I believe it would add more context to provide the 
strings
and 
file
outputs, they may give some strings and types that are relevant to some file formats or encryption/encoding scheme. Maybe you can give 
binwalk
as try as well in case it had multiple embedded resources in one binary.
Post a link to the file please

answers_data.content:
This is probably a Mach-O executable (
__cstring
), but opening a binary file in a text editor won't give lot of info. It's basically a guess game at this stage. Use the 
file
command on this file to make sure it's an executable and disassemble it maybe?
